snippet: Bo Van Pelt's 5-year-old son, Crew, recently asked his dad if he had ever made a hole-in-one. Van Pelt told him yes, actually, he had made seven, five of them in professional tour events.
abstract: Bo Van Pelt's 5-year-old son, Crew, recently asked his dad if he had ever made a hole-in-one. Van Pelt told him yes, actually, he had made seven, five of them in professional tour events.

headline.main: Hole in One Highlights Van Pelt's Late Charge
